edited_stories.edited_story_text: The speaker at the military graduation gave a challenging speech. After the oath was administered, the speaker was presented with an award. This was followed by applause and then the new graduates all continued the tradition of flinging their caps into the air.

edited_stories.edited_story_text: Our guest speaker was truly inspiring.  He led us before our annual graduation of Naval cadets.  At the end we all threw our hats into the air.

edited_stories.edited_story_text: So proud to have finally graduated from the United States Naval Academy. I got to meet one of our old alumni who graduated in the 1960s. I will never forget this moment.
